item.title: TurnOff.us
item.description: This week I happened to meet a minimalist blog about everyday life and technology, I really liked it and I want to share a post of it here :) See turnoff.us
item.content:

item.title: Hello World
item.description: I created this blog to have fun, share and learn, I hope you like it, follow it and have fun
item.content: I created this blog to have fun, share and learn, I hope you like it, follow it and have fun
